Hi All,

  A technique named as CRC (Class - Responsibility - Collaboration) 
is used to decide the class design & constituent methods in each 
class.

  What are the concerns to testing CRC design ?

  i.e. How to test a Class using JUnit ?
  How to test Responsibilities of an individual class using JUnit ?
  How to test Collaborations between classes using JUnit ? 

  Waiting for response...

Regards,
--- Shivprasad Mangesh Bhide
